data.title: Bahçecik, Sur
data.meta_description: Bahçecik is a neighbourhood of the municipality and district of Sur, Diyarbakır Province, southeastern Turkey. Its population is 121 (2022). The village is inhabited by Yazidis and is located ca. 27 kilometres (17 mi) east of Diyarbakır in southeastern Anatolia.
data.text:
Bahçecik is a neighbourhood of the municipality and district of Sur, Diyarbakır Province, southeastern Turkey.[1] Its population is 121 (2022).[2] The village is inhabited by Yazidis and is located ca. 27 kilometres (17 mi) east of Diyarbakır in southeastern Anatolia.[3]
